0: I had dinner twice at the Grill bar in the lobby served by Hakim he was delightful welcoming knowledgeable friendly
The hotel facilities are great beautiful banquet rooms yummy food and again great service
We celebrated our sons bar mitzvah at the Bethesda Hyat including a dinner on Friday night for over 30 people the bar mitzvah service and a reception for over 150 people
The hotel seems to have made aesthetic improvements and also added a very nice late night snack bar amenity for guests arriving at a late hour
Nice touches included the flavored waters and apples in the lobby
Very spacious with all of the usual accommodations
Great location for restaurants nice rooms decent fitness facility rapid internet
I love sitting at the lobby bar in the evening especially when travelling alone
Every Hyat I have stayed at has been upscale with nice amenities in the rooms and common areas fancier bathrooms and good breakfast options
1: She also gave my temporary amenities without my asking
The lobby and interior is being renovated
We hope that part of the renovation will be to update and upgrade the elevators
The lobby is still in the process Of an update but the rooms are new and really beautiful and comfortable
The lobby was beautiful and besides one tarp on what seems like escalators that were not working it was not any construction in the lobby that was major
Nice room bed but hallways could use some wall decorations personal opinionThe elevators nice glass walls with view of building interior were in need of face lift in progress
I would recommend that my family use your facility and I would stay in your hotel again if in the area
Room was great as was the check in but the hotel is undergoing renovation so access to the garage and hotel entrance was somewhat inconvenient
And the restaurant in the lobby was very acomodating
Mortons Steakhouse is located in their main lobby and I will review it separately
2: If you need to park the garage is underneath but there is no direct access to the lobby
can not beat having a Mortons in the lobby
Turned off the unit and opened our door to compensate with hallway air
Had a terrible accidental experience happen at this facility
I had to wait in the lobby for over an hour before I could get in to allow housekeeping to finish
This was not a busy time in the lobby I should mention
Sound did not seem to carry or echo around the atrium like in some other hotels
If you want an upscale dinner on site Morton ’s is right in the lobby
However the original design of the hotel is an open atrium with all of the rooms opening into the atrium that rises from the lobby to the roof
I was worried about possible noise as the hotel design affords a central open area up to a glass atrium with room doors facing the open atrium but surprised that it was fairly quiet
